thread.title: Optimize Supply Chain Management
thread.title_full: Optimize Supply Chain Management - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Optimize Supply Chain Management
text:
Innovation Enterprise are proud to be hosting the Chief Supply Chain Officer & Inventory Optimization Summit, this November 11 & 12. The summit is taking place at the Hilton Chicago Magnificent Mile Hotel in Chicago and is an absolute must for those who work in the supply chain industry.
IL (PRWEB) October 08, 2015
As corporate leaders come to understand the critical role supply chain operations play in a company's success, logistics is an increasingly frequent topic of boardroom discussions—and it is becoming common to find executives with supply chain or logistics titles holding a seat at the conference table.
"Companies are now vesting more power and responsibility in their supply chain executives," says Bob Heaney, senior analyst in the supply chain management practice at Boston-based Aberdeen Group.
All of the burning issues facing Supply Chain executives will be dealt with in no holds barred discussions at the Chief Supply Chain Officer Summit . Hear from an industry leading speaker line-up consisting of professionals from global organizations. Speakers include the L’Oreal, Google, Starbucks, McCains Foods, Honeywell and many others.
Over the two day summit, there will be interactive panel sessions taking place, as well as keynote presentations throughout the day from industry expert speakers. The interactive panel sessions offer the chance to engage with your peers and have your say on your most pressing topics. Those present will be able to reap the benefits of having questions answered and discussed by numerous experts in the supply chain function. As well as having questions answered, there will be discussion topics put to those on the panel in order to get a view on things from different perspectives of varying job types in varying companies.
'The summit is set to be the best yet. With keynote presentations and case-studies focused around not just supply chain management, but also how to best optimize your inventory, it is not to be missed,” said Amy Hill, Global Events Director.
For a full line-up of speakers, keynote presentations and more, see the summit overview here: http://theinnovationenterprise.com/summits/csco-chicago-2015
For more information on the summit, or to secure one of the last remaining passes, please contact Nathan at nedwards(at)theiegroup(dot)com (+1 415 670 9064) as soon as possible to avoid disappointment. Receive a $300 discount using the code CSCO300 .
About Innovation Enterprise:
Innovation Enterprise, a CFO Publishing company is an independent business-to-business multi-channel media brand focused on the information needs of Senior Finance, Operations, Analytics, Big Data, Strategy, Digital, Innovation & Sports executives. Products include IE.Summits, ieOnDemand, ieWebinars, ieWhitepapers & more.
Whether it's delivered online, or in person, everything Innovation Enterprise produces reflects the company's unshakeable belief in the power of information to spur innovation.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13000742.htm
